amenities.title: Private Entrance
amenities.description: Enjoy comfort and privacy in your own Wooded Ridge Condominium.

amenities.title: Parking
amenities.description: Wooded Ridge parking is paved and maintained year round.

amenities.title: 1 Queen Bed, 1 King Bed, 1 Sleeper Sofa
amenities.description: Sleep 6 comfortably on one King sized bed, one Queen sized bed and one pull out sleeper sofa.

amenities.title: Ski-In-Ski-Out Access to Resort
amenities.description: Your Wooded Ridge Condo is literally situated on Eagle Point Mountain Resort ski and snowboard runs

amenities.title: Jacuzzi / Hot Tub
amenities.description: Spend the days exploring Eagle Point Mountain Resort and all the hikes, biking, skiing, fly fishing and sights in the area, then relax those tired muscles in at the Hot Tub Garden just feet away.

amenities.title: Amazing Views
amenities.description: Look out directly onto Eagle Point Mountain Resort from every window and from your own private balcony.

amenities.title: Propane BBQ Grill
amenities.description: Full kitchen and dinning table for 6.

amenities.title: Find More on Instagram
amenities.description: Check out other guest's experience and share your own by searching & tagging your photos with #mtcabinsutguest & @mtcabinsutguide. We can't wait to meet you!!!
